SEARCH
Package com.mjh.innaxyswebapp.service

Class NodeService

java.lang.Object
com.mjh.innaxyswebapp.service.NodeService
@Service public class NodeService extends Object
Class which allows for access to various methods which will alter the data within the 'nodes' table of the database. CRUD principles are found here and can be used to add nodes to the 'nodes' table, as well as retrieval, deletion, and updating. The NodeRepository can be reviewed to find further queries necessary to ensure that if a node is removed, its edge will also be removed.
Since:
02-10-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
MaxMJH - MaxHarrisMJH@gmail.com

  • Method Details

    • createNode

      public Node createNode(Node node)
      Method used to add a node to the database.
      Parameters:
      node - The node of which to add.
      Returns:
      The saved node.

    • getAllNodes

      public List<Node> getAllNodes()
      Method used to get all nodes from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all nodes within the nodes table.

    • getNode

      public Optional<Node> getNode(String name)
      Method used to get a node specified by a primary key (name of the node).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the node.
      Returns:
      An Optional if the node exists, or an empty Optional otherwise.

    • updateNode

      public Node updateNode(String name, Node node)
      Method used to update an existing node within the database - note that the nodes primary key must also be passed.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the node to update.
      node - The node which contains the new data.
      Returns:
      The updated node, or null if update failed.

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode(Node node)
      Method used to remove a node from the database as well as its edges.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to remove from the database.

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode(String name)
      Method used to remove a node from the database as well as its edges, specified by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the node to remove from the database.

    • removeAll

      public void removeAll()
      Method used to remove all nodes from the nodes table as well as all edges.

    • tableExists

      public boolean tableExists()
      Method used to check if the 'nodes' table exists in the database.
      Returns:
      true if the table exists, false otherwise.

    • createTable

      public void createTable()
      Method used to ensure that the 'nodes' table exists even if deleted after application has started.
